item.title: Traverxec - HackTheBox
item.description: Traverxec was in my opinion a particular and interesting box. While being rated easy it still teach me a little trick and got me very frustrated at some point because it was super easy to overlook and overthink easy things. Still it was worth cogitate on it! Tl;Dr: The user flag was accessible after using a Remote Code Execution exploit on the nhttpd web server running, giving us access to the www-data user.
